name: Calib ON
func:
msg.payload = "ON"
return msg;

name: set status OK
func:
msg.payload = {fill: "green", text: msg.payload + "ppm"}
return msg;

name: flow.co2
func:
flow.set("co2", msg.payload);
return msg;

name: flow.co2warn
func:
flow.set("co2warn", msg.payload);
return msg;

name: flow.co2high
func:
flow.set("co2high", msg.payload);
return msg;

name: flow.co2high
func:
flow.set("status", msg.payload);
return msg;

name: !!! How to develop the UI --> Details
info:
Docs: http://192.168.20.17:1880/uibuilder/techdocs/#/svelte

(1) open console and login
(2) navigate to ~/.node-red/projects/stHome/uibuilder/home
(3) execute: npm run dev

query:
from(bucket: "homematic")
  |> range(start: -8h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ACTUAL_TEMPERATURE" or r["_measurement"] == "HUMIDITY" or r["_measurement"] == "TEMPERATURE")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "homematic")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "00-Flur-Licht" or r["name"] == "00-Treppe-Licht" or r["name"] == "00-Wohn-Licht")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "LEVEL" or r["_measurement"] == "STATE")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "hue")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "light")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> last(column: "name")

name: Transform
func:
return {
    topic: "hm00/" + msg.deviceName + "/" + msg.datapoint,
    payload: msg.payload,
    ccu : "hm00",
    name: msg.deviceName,
    datapoint: msg.datapoint,
    channelType: msg.channelType,
    deviceType: msg.deviceType};

name: hm trg switch/dimmer
Transform
func:
return {
    topic: "hm02/" + msg.deviceName + "/" + msg.datapoint,
    payload: msg.payload,
    ccu : "hm02",
    name: msg.deviceName,
    datapoint: msg.datapoint,
    channelType: msg.channelType,
    deviceType: msg.deviceType};

00-Outdoor-Temp.vNorth:Temperature
query:
from(bucket: "homematic")
  |> range(start: -5h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "TEMPERATURE")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "00-Outdoor-Temp.vNorth")
  |> last()

name: socFaultState
query:
from(bucket: "ev")
  |> range(start: -5h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "carSocFaultState")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "smartEQ")
  |> last()

query:
s1 = from(bucket: "powerMan")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ac_PowerReal")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] == "1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "inverter")
  |> last()

  s2 = from(bucket: "powerMan")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ac_Power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance"] == "1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "battery")
  |> last()

  union(tables: [s1,s2])

name: hue trg switch/dimmer

query:
from(bucket: "hue")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "light")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "00-Wohn-L02" or r["name"] == "00-Wohn-L03" or r["name"] == "00-Wohn-L04" or r["name"] == "00-Wohn-L05")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> last(column: "name")

name: Trans to Group

query:
from(bucket: "hue")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "light")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "01-Bad-Decke" or r["name"] == "01-Bad-L01")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> last(column: "name")

name: function 9
func: return { payload : { fetch : "group" }}
